==================================================[Document: Fuel Gas High.pdf (p.1), Page: 1]
# Fuel Gas High-Temperature Coalescing Filter - Engineering Data Sheet ## 1. GENERAL INFORMATION Ìï≠Î™© ÎÇ¥Ïö© Service Name Fuel Gas Coalescing Filter for Gas Turbine Tag Number FG-FLT-001 Plant / Unit LNG Combined Cycle Power Plant Vendor Document No. Revision 0 Date ## 2. DESIGN CONDITIONS Ìï≠Î™© | Í∞í | 
 Design Pressure | 40 barg (ÎòêÎäî ÌîÑÎ°úÏ†ùÌä∏ Vessel Design Basis) | 
 Operating Pressure | 30-36 barg | 
 Design Temperature | 350‚ÑÉ | 
 Operating Temperature 280-310‚ÑÉ Fluid | Natural Gas (CH4-rich; trace C2~C6 hydrocarbons) | 
 Contaminants | Liquid aerosols, fine solids, lubrication oil trace | 
 Gas Flow Rate | | 
 Density @ Operating | | 
 Viscosity @ Operating | | 
 ## 3. FILTER ELEMENT SPECIFICATIONS ### 3.1 Filter Media

[Document: Fuel Gas High.pdf (p.3), Page: 3]
## 5. VESSEL / HOUSING REQUIREMENTS Ìï≠Î™© | Í∞í | 
 Vessel Type | Vertical Filter Vessel | 
 Design Code | ASME Section VIII Div.1 | 
 Material | Carbon Steel + Insulation (SS clad optional) | 
 Nozzle Rating | ASME Class 600 | 
 Internal Supports | SS316L | 
 Drain / Vent | SS316 | 
 Insulation | Mineral wool (high temp) | 
 Corrosion Allowance Project spec (e.g., 3 mm) ## 6. PERFORMANCE REQUIREMENTS Ìï≠Î™© Í∞í Coalescing Efficiency ‚â• 99.5% (Liquid aerosols) Solids Removal 1-5 um absolute Bypass Prevention No internal bypass (mechanical lock) Flow Direction Inside-to-out / Outside-to-in (Vendor proposal) Startup AP ‚â§ 0.05 bar ## 7. INSPECTION & TESTING Ìï≠Î™© ÏöîÍµ¨ÏÇ¨Ìï≠ Material Certificates EN 10204 3.1 (all metallic wetted parts) Pressure Test Hydrotest / Pneumatic (ASME VIII) High-Temp Collapse Vendor certification required Weld Testing VT + NDE (RT/MT/PT per project spec)

[Document: Fuel Gas High.pdf (p.2), Page: 2]
Ìï≠Î™© Í∞í Filter Media Type | Sintered Stainless-Steel Fiber | 
 Material | SS316L (ÏòµÏÖò: Inconel 600/625 for sour gas / H2S) | 
 Max Continuous Temp ‚â• 400‚ÑÉ ### 3.2 Filtration Performance Ìï≠Î™© Í∞í Filtration Rating 1-5 um (absolute), coalescing grade Aerosol Removal Efficiency ‚â• 99.5% @ 0.3 um Initial AP ‚â§ 0.05 bar @ rated flow Max Allowable AP 0.5-1.0 bar ### 3.3 Mechanical Construction Ìï≠Î™© Í∞í Element Style Cylindrical or Pleated Metallic End Caps SS316L, welded Core & Outer Support SS316L perforated tube/shell Bonding Method All-metal bonding only (no adhesives) Collapse Pressure @ 350‚ÑÉ ‚â• 3 bar Dimensions Length / Diameter: ## 4. SEAL & GASKET REQUIREMENTS Ìï≠Î™© Í∞í Gasket Type Spiral-wound (SS316L + Graphite) O-Ring Use Not allowed above 200‚ÑÉ Leak Tightness ANSI/FCI 70-2 Class VI preferred Seal Location Top cover / element seat / outlet plate

[Document: Fuel Gas High.pdf (p.4), Page: 4]
## Ìï≠Î™© ÏöîÍµ¨ÏÇ¨Ìï≠ Performance Test Filter efficiency test data required ## 8. OPERATION & MAINTENANCE ### Ìï≠Î™© ÎÇ¥Ïö© Replacement AP Setpoint 0.3-0.4 bar Spare Elements | Minimum 2 sets per unit | 
 Cleaning | Backwash possible (design dependent) | 
 Service Life | 2-5 years (gas quality dependent) | 
 Maintenance Notes | Inspect seals; track AP trend | 
 ## 9. PROJECT NOTES ¬∑ Polymer-based filter media strictly prohibited (high temperature safety). ¬∑ Vendor shall submit full technical data, drawings, and calculations. ¬∑ Gas composition sheet & P&ID must be attached for final sizing. ¬∑ Vendor must confirm compatibility with contaminants & temperature cycles.
